sentences.en: After he verified his biological parentage, he felt sad.
sentences.cn: 他验明了自己的身世, 很难受.

sentences.en: an English-born man with Irish parentage
sentences.cn: 出生于英格兰的爱尔兰裔男子

sentences.en: And I think that sense for the parentage of Australian identity is quite important.
sentences.cn: 这一点对于澳大利亚自我定位过程中的身世探寻,具有十分重要的意义.

sentences.en: Annabel was, like the writer, of mixed parentage: half - English, half - Dutch, in her case.
sentences.cn: 安娜贝尔和作者本人一样, 也是混血儿: 她拥有一半英国 、 一半荷兰血统.

sentences.en: He is of mixed parentage: half Dutch, half English.
sentences.cn: 他有著异族 通婚 的父母,一半荷兰一半英国.

sentences.en: He was born in France in 1670 of unknown parentage (= nobody knows who his parents were ) .
sentences.cn: 1670 年他出生于法国，家世不明。

sentences.en: He was born of Anglo-American parentage.
He was born of humble parentage.
He was born of poor parentage.
It proudly sports its parentage , having the breeding and elegance of wines grown on outstanding terroirs.
sentences.cn: 又因他的系出名门, 专属于大宝庄园的优雅气质在他身上同样不逊色!

sentences.en: My dog, Holly, was a gentle, gregarious, well - behaved seven - year - old of mixed parentage.
sentences.cn: 我的混血狗霍莉7 岁, 它性情温和 、 合群 、 有礼貌.

sentences.en: She was born of humble parentage.
She's a Londoner of mixed parentage (English and Jamaican).
sentences.cn: 她是个混血（英国和牙买加）伦敦人。

sentences.en: The daughter - in - law , even though of mixed parentage, does know the difference between Qingming and Christmas.
sentences.cn: 虽然这位 媳妇 是华欧裔, 但她还是能够分辨清明和圣诞节之间的差别.

sentences.en: They are chiefly of Jewish parentage.
sentences.cn: 他们大体上有犹太血统.

sentences.en: They still did not know her place of birth or her parentage.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然不知道她的出身地和家庭门第.

sentences.en: We are all the result of our parentage and up-bringing.
sentences.cn: 我们都是由各自的出身和教育造就的。

words.tran_cn: 父母亲的，父母的；亲代的，亲本的
父亲（或母亲）；父母亲；根源
出身；亲子关系；门第；起源

trans.tran_cn: 出身，门第，父母亲的身份，起源，亲子关系
trans.tran_en: someone’s parents and the country and social class they are from
